,TRUE,4,4,5,3,4 J14T14","2017-11-06T15:56:42.96Z","LEGOÂ® 30476 Happy Turtle Review","

I got this set free at Target.com. You could either but it for about $3-4 or get it free with a purchase of certain sets. When I showed my mom the pics of it, she thought that it looked like a Hershey crunch bar with legs, but when I get it, we both agreed that it looked much better in person. The set is easy to build and has a good amount of movement
column2: in the fins and head with the use of Mixles ball joints. I know that LEGO&reg
column5: t have the exact color in their inventory&nbsp
column6: to accuratly capture the color of an actual sea turtle, but I think that they did a great job with what they had. One thing that I think that they could have done differently is to use a tan 2x4 plate on the bottom instead of a brown one to make it look a bit more accurate. Over all, this is a cute little polybag that I think would look great with anyones LEGO collection.
